title: narasimhaa nannu
sahitya:
narasimha nanu brOvavE shrI lakSmi

anupallavi

 kOramAlina narula koniyADanu nEnu parama pAvana nApAli shrI lakSmi

caraNam 1

 nIdu bhakta grEsaruDu prahlAduDapuDoka kanaka kashipu 
vAdu kOrvaka ninnu sharaNamani yAdu kOmana gAcinAvu
   
caraNam 2

 entakani sairintu shrI manasandu teliyanidi Edi lOkula 
ninda kOrvaka ninnu kOrinandu kentani karuNa cUtuvO
   
caraNam 3

 nI japamu nI smaraNa nI pada pUja nI vAri celimi osagi 
rAjiga daya cEyu tyAgarAja sannuta taramu gAdu
